The three laws of effective visual communication correspond to the three main ingredients of any quantitative work: purpose, data, and message. Getting these right leads to success; failing in any of them leads to overall failure. Watch the video or read our [tutorial](tutorial.html) or [online post](https://graphicsprinciples.github.io/gallery/posts/2019/2019-09-09-three-laws-vizcom/) to learn more.
